/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight under a clear blue sky. Dominating the center of the frame is a large concrete overpass, its curved structure arching gracefully over the street below. The overpass is adorned with a blue sign bearing the number "2", standing out against the muted colors of the concrete.

The street itself is a hive of activity, with several cars and a bus navigating their way under the watchful eye of the overpass. The buildings that line the street are tall and modern, their glass facades reflecting the sunlight and adding a touch of elegance to the urban landscape.

The perspective of the image is particularly striking, taken from a low angle that looks up at the overpass and the towering buildings. This angle not only emphasizes the height and grandeur of the structures but also gives a sense of being right there on the street, amidst the hustle and bustle of city life.
